definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人谢拉的儿子约巴接续他作王。

sentences.english: Tamar, Judah's daughter-in-law, bore him Perez and Zerah.
sentences.chinese: 犹大的儿妇他玛给犹大生法勒斯和谢拉。

sentences.english: However, Gerard Butler may disappoint many audiences as the Phantom.
sentences.chinese: 然而，谢拉毕拿饰演的魅影或许令不少观众失望。

sentences.english: What do you know about Sheraton Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 关于谢拉顿酒店你了解多少？

sentences.english: And Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人谢拉的儿子约巴接续他作王。

sentences.english: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人谢拉的儿子约巴接续他作王。

sentences.english: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
sentences.chinese: 流珥的儿子是拿哈，谢拉，沙玛，米撒。

sentences.english: And of the sons of Zerah； Jeuel， and their brethren， six hundred and ninety.
sentences.chinese: 谢拉的子孙中有耶乌利和他的弟兄，共六百九十人。

sentences.english: Do you believe you will fit in at the Sheraton Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 你认为你可以适合在谢拉顿酒店工作么？

sentences.english: And of the sons of Zerah; Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
sentences.chinese: 谢拉的子孙中有耶乌利和他的弟兄，共六百九十人。

sentences.english: What do you hope to bring away after working at Sheraton Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 你希望在谢拉顿酒店工作后带走什么？

definition: Alan, Allen, Allan, Alain etc (name)/A-lan (Chinese female name)
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
